sn22.36:4.2: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha …
sn22.36:4.4: “Sir, may the Buddha please teach me Dharma in brief. When I’ve heard it, I’ll live alone, withdrawn, diligent, keen, and determined.”
sn22.36:4.5: “Mendicant, you’re measured against what you have a tendency for,
sn22.36:4.6: and you’re defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:4.7: You’re not measured against what you have no tendency for,
sn22.36:4.8: and you’re not defined by what you’re not measured against.”
sn22.36:5.1: “But how do you see the detailed meaning of my brief statement?”
sn22.36:5.2: “If you have a tendency for form, you’re measured against that,
sn22.36:5.3: and you’re defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:5.4: If you have a tendency for feeling …
sn22.36:5.8: and you’re defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:5.9: If you have no tendency for form, you’re not measured against that,
sn22.36:5.10: and you’re not defined by what you’re not measured against.
sn22.36:5.11: If you have no tendency for feeling …
sn22.36:5.14: consciousness, you’re not measured against that,
sn22.36:5.15: and you’re not defined by what you’re not measured against.
sn22.36:5.16: That’s how I understand the detailed meaning of the Buddha’s brief statement.”
sn22.36:6.2: It’s good that you understand the detailed meaning of what I’ve said in brief like this.
sn22.36:6.3: If you have a tendency for form, you’re measured against that,
sn22.36:6.4: and you’re defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:6.5: If you have a tendency for feeling …
sn22.36:6.9: and you’re defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:6.10: If you have no tendency for form, you’re measured against that,
sn22.36:6.11: and you’re not defined by what you’re measured against.
sn22.36:6.12: If you have no tendency for feeling …
sn22.36:6.15: consciousness, you’re not measured against that,
sn22.36:6.16: and you’re not defined by what you’re not measured against.
sn22.36:6.17: This is how to understand the detailed meaning of what I said in brief.” …
sn22.36:6.18: And that mendicant became one of the perfected.
